评论详情: lovedddd it! im normally a Medium and it fitted great! was warm for florida winter, as the photo!

I got a ton of compliments on this when I wore it (including from my 5 year old son, so you know it's cute). It's very soft, squishy, and cozy. Hits at the perfect cropped length and the lantern sleeves are very cute.

I absolutely love this cardigan! It’s super cozy and nicely made. The strawberries don’t puff out like on the picture but if you mess with them a bit you can make them stick out more and create a similar look. People stop and compliment me just about every time I’ve worn it out, I definitely recommend getting this

The image on this sweater showed "puffy strawberries" on it, which I thought I was getting when I purchased this, but I was wrong. They are not puffy, in fact they are sown straight on to the sweater, and poorly done as well. One of the strawberries were falling off of the product, I was very upset about this when I received it. It was also difficult to get In touch with someone to send it back, and it took a while until it was shipped back because of this. The sweater is also overly cropped, and I bought a large. The white color of the sweater is more of a gray as well, and I would generally just recommend buying another sweater like this, but from a different company. The only thing I can't complain about is that the fabric was soft, so that was the only plus.
This sweater is so thick and soft!! Looks like solid construction. I’ll be anxious so see how it fits my daughter.

评论概述: The strawberries aren’t puffy like the photo but still cute!
评论详情: Such a cute sweater I wish the strawberries were exactly as advertised.  The reason I purchased this sweater was because the strawberries in the picture looked so adorable and 3D but once I got the sweater, I realized the strawberries are not the same as the photo advertised. In person, the strawberries appear flat with not many strawberries around the sweater either.  Other than that, I do not regret my purchase. I received a few compliments. Overall, I love the sweater. It’s very comfortable and thick. Good quality.
Good quality, heavy chunky sweater.  Sleeves are nice and roomy, but waist is too tight.  Would like to order one with pink strawberries if available.

The material is okay but there aren’t as many berries on it (two less than the picture) and the berries are smaller than the picture and there aren’t any berries on the back of the sweater. For $50 I would have expected better.
I absolutely love this sweater. Every time I wear it I get so many compliments just so you know it is at the waist line not exactly a crop, but comes to the top of your jeans.

This item came exactly as pictured and is great quality!! Highly recommend!

But it is very nicely made and gets a lot of attention!
